Sentencas: In this paper, a novel aviation solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine (SOFC-GT) hybrid system based on n-decane reforming with low water to carbon ratio (S/C) is studied.
Titulo: Influence of fuel reforming with low water to carbon ratio on thermodynamic performance of aviation solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The system not only improves the power generation performance but also reduces the weight penalty caused by the large demand for water in fuel reforming process.
Titulo: Influence of fuel reforming with low water to carbon ratio on thermodynamic performance of aviation solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Therefore, by establishing the system model, the effects of reforming parameters on the performance of reforming, SOFC and the system at low S/C are analyzed in turn.
Titulo: Influence of fuel reforming with low water to carbon ratio on thermodynamic performance of aviation solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: And the safe range of reforming parameters is determined by taking carbon formation, excessive temperature gradient and temperature of SOFC as the safety boundary.
Titulo: Influence of fuel reforming with low water to carbon ratio on thermodynamic performance of aviation solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The results show that high S/C, oxygen to carbon ratio (O/C) and reforming temperature inhibit carbon formation.
Titulo: Influence of fuel reforming with low water to carbon ratio on thermodynamic performance of aviation solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The SOFC temperature gradient is affected by SOFC efficiency and excess air ratio.
Titulo: Influence of fuel reforming with low water to carbon ratio on thermodynamic performance of aviation solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Therefore, changing reforming temperature or substance ratio is an effective way to reduce the SOFC temperature gradient.
Titulo: Influence of fuel reforming with low water to carbon ratio on thermodynamic performance of aviation solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: When the reforming temperature is 1023 K, the area of safety region reaches the maximum within the substance ratio studied.
Titulo: Influence of fuel reforming with low water to carbon ratio on thermodynamic performance of aviation solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The S/C has little effect on system efficiency, while low O/C and high reforming temperature effectively improve system efficiency, but it also increases the size of air preheater significantly.
Titulo: Influence of fuel reforming with low water to carbon ratio on thermodynamic performance of aviation solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system
